/>
V.iii.12.B.1.q
.
TBI Special Issue
Ensure that the
Traumatic Brain Injury
special issue indicator has been added in all cases involving claims for TBI by reviewing the VBMS profile screen.
Reference
:  For more information on special issue indicators, see
M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, 2.F.2.f and g
, and
M21-4, Appendix E, 2
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 12, Section B - Traumatic Brain Injury (TBI)
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 12, Section B
